definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: But setting up a blog is just the first step.
sentences.chinese: 话虽如此，开通一个博客却仅仅是第一步。

sentences.english: That being said, I am extremely jealous of the slimline hardware.
sentences.chinese: 话虽如此，我感到非常嫉妒的超薄硬件。

sentences.english: Having said that, I will not write off the challenges from Selangor and Malacca.
sentences.chinese: 话虽如此，我就不写了从雪兰莪州和马六甲的挑战。

sentences.english: Having said that, there will be investments.
sentences.chinese: 话虽如此，投资还是会有的。

sentences.english: Of course, the rest of you are welcome to listen as well!
sentences.chinese: 话虽如此，如果大家愿意倾听，我当然无任欢迎。

definition: to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
to force someone to do something
